description.message: Reliable website blocker and redirect tool to help you stay focused.

paragraph.message: To block a website or resource, type part of its name in the field with the placeholder "Type Block URL" — for example, "facebook" will block all related subdomains. In the field with the placeholder "Type Redirect URL", enter the full redirect address including the protocol, such as "https://google.com". If the redirect field is left empty, the site will be blocked without redirection. Click Save to apply the rule. To update a rule, delete the old one and create a new entry.

blockurlonlylower.message: Block URL supports only lowercase letters

donatespantext.message: Like this extension? Support its development!

sendfeedbackbody.message: Hello, I’d like to share the following feedback:

quote2.message: Your future is created by what you do today.

quote3.message: Discipline is the bridge between goals and success.

quote4.message: One site blocked, one step closer to your goal.

quote6.message: Don’t watch the clock; do what it does. Keep going.

quote7.message: Small steps every day lead to big results.

quote8.message: Your only limit is your mind.

quote9.message: Success is the sum of small efforts repeated daily.

quote10.message: Focus on being productive, not busy.

gotopopup.message: Click the extension icon to return to the popup.

optionsdescription.message: Configure the extension’s behaviour and security settings

normalmodedesc.message: Rules can be deleted instantly with a single click

strictmodedesc.message: Rules require a 10-second countdown before deletion to prevent accidental removal

confirmdeletedesc.message: Show a confirmation dialogue when deleting multiple rules at once

notificationsdesc.message: Display notifications when the extension is updated

ruleswillbereplaced.message: Current rules will be replaced. Continue?

willdeleteallrules.message: This will permanently delete all $rulescount$ rules.

cannotbeundone.message: This action cannot be undone. Continue?

willreset.message: This will reset all settings to their default values. Continue?

rulelimitreached.message: You have reached the rule limit ($limit$) for the basic version. Upgrade to Pro for unlimited rules.

passwordtooshort.message: Password must be at least 6 characters

resetpasswordconfirm.message: Resetting the password will disable protection. Continue?

prorequired.message: Pro mode required for this feature

enablepassworddesc.message: Require a password to delete or edit rules (enhances strict mode)

startafterend.message: Start time must be before end time

invalidschedule.message: Invalid schedule: please select days and times.

invalidscheduledays.message: Invalid schedule: please select at least one day.

invalidschedulestarttime.message: Invalid schedule: please set a start time.

invalidscheduleendtime.message: Invalid schedule: please set an end time.

editdisablednonpro.message: Editing disabled: too many rules for non-Pro users.

norulesforcategory.message: No blocked sites for this category.

profunctionstext.message: Pro features include: scheduled blocking, password protection, rule filtering and search, rule export/import, and cross-browser sync. To unlock Pro, first purchase a subscription at blockdistraction.com. After payment, return to this page and enter your email below to activate Pro.

subscriptionnotfound.message: Subscription not active or email not found.

options_pro_key_instructions.message: Log in to blockdistraction.com to find your key.

options_pro_status_invalid.message: Licence key is invalid or has expired.

options_pro_status_error.message: An error occurred. Please check your internet connection.

onboarding_intro.message: Thank you for installing our extension. There’s just one final step to activate your protection.

onboarding_box_p1.message: To block sites, the extension requires access to your tabs. Because this is a powerful permission, you must grant it manually.

onboarding_box_p2.message: Please click the button below. A browser pop-up will appear asking you to "Allow" this permission.

onboarding_status_success.message: Success! Protection is now active. You may close this tab.

onboarding_status_denied.message: Permission was denied. The extension cannot function correctly. Please try again or grant permission from the extension settings.

onboarding_status_error.message: An error occurred. Please grant permission from the extension settings.

onboarding_status_api_error.message: The permission request failed (this can happen on mobile). Please try again, or grant permission manually from the extension settings.
